name: Londonian Gothics - Meikyuu No Lolita
description:
Alice's father has been kidnapped by creatures of the night, and it is unknown whether he's alive or dead. You, as Alice, insist on following down into the labyrinth via a hole in the basement to find and rescue him. Your lolita dresses contain the powers needed to protect you from the dangers that lurk within...

(Source of Description - GiantBomb; 'Londonian Gothics: Meikyuu no Lolita')
